Description:
Detects process handle on LSASS process with certain access mask

Author: Roberto Rodriguez, Teymur Kheirkhabarov, Dimitrios Slamaris, Mark Russinovich, Aleksey Potapov, oscd.community (update)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Potentially Suspicious AccessMask Requested From LSASS
Query: sourcetype='windows-security' eql select * from _source_ where (((eventid = '4663' and objectname like '%\lsass.exe' and (accesslist like '%4484%' or accesslist like '%4416%')) or (eventid = '4656' and objectname like '%\lsass.exe' and (accessmask like '%0x40%' or accessmask like '%0x1400%' or accessmask like '%0x100000%' or accessmask like '%0x1410%' or accessmask like '%0x1010%' or accessmask like '%0x1438%' or accessmask like '%0x143a%' or accessmask like '%0x1418%' or accessmask like '%0x1f0fff%' or accessmask like '%0x1f1fff%' or accessmask like '%0x1f2fff%' or accessmask like '%0x1f3fff%'))) and  not ((processname like '%:\Windows\Temp\asgard2-agent-sc\aurora\%' and processname like '%\aurora-agent-64.exe' and accesslist like '%%%4484%') or ((processname like '%:\Users\%' and processname like '%\AppData\Local\Temp\is-%') and processname like '%\avira_system_speedup.tmp' and accesslist like '%%%4484%') or (processname like '%:\Windows\SystemTemp\%' and processname like '%\GoogleUpdate.exe' and accesslist like '%%%4484%') or ((processname like '%\csrss.exe' or processname like '%\GamingServices.exe' or processname like '%\lsm.exe' or processname like '%\MicrosoftEdgeUpdate.exe' or processname like '%\minionhost.exe' or processname like '%\MRT.exe' or processname like '%\MsMpEng.exe' or processname like '%\perfmon.exe' or processname like '%\procexp.exe' or processname like '%\procexp64.exe' or processname like '%\svchost.exe' or processname like '%\taskmgr.exe' or processname like '%\thor.exe' or processname like '%\thor64.exe' or processname like '%\vmtoolsd.exe' or processname like '%\VsTskMgr.exe' or processname like '%\wininit.exe' or processname like '%\wmiprvse.exe' or processname like '%RtkAudUService64') and (processname like '%:\Program Files (x86)\%' or processname like '%:\Program Files\%' or processname like '%:\ProgramData\Microsoft\Windows Defender\Platform\%' or processname like '%:\Windows\SysNative\%' or processname like '%:\Windows\System32\%' or processname like '%:\Windows\SysWow64\%' or processname like '%:\Windows\Temp\asgard2-agent\%')) or processname like '%:\Program Files%' or (processname like '%:\Windows\System32\taskhostw.exe' or processname like '%:\Windows\System32\msiexec.exe' or processname like '%:\Windows\CCM\CcmExec.exe') or (processname like '%:\Windows\Sysmon64.exe' and accesslist like '%%%4484%') or (processname like '%\x64\SCENARIOENGINE.EXE' and accesslist like '%%%4484%') or (processname like '%:\Windows\Temp\%' and processname like '%\avira_speedup_setup_update.tmp' and accesslist like '%%%4484%') or (processname like '%:\Windows\System32\snmp.exe' and accesslist like '%%%4484%')) and  not ((processname like '%\procmon64.exe' or processname like '%\procmon.exe') and accesslist like '%%%4484%'))
